_documentation.description: Configuration options for the AI Agent service. All values can be overridden via environment variables. API keys (LANGCHAIN_API_KEY, OPENAI_API_KEY) must be set via environment variables only.
_documentation.ollama_model: Model name for Ollama (local model). Example: 'llama3:latest', 'mistral:latest'
_documentation.ollama_base_url: Base URL for Ollama API. Default: http://localhost:11434
_documentation.langchain_tracing_v2: Enable LangSmith tracing. Set to 'true' or 'false'
_documentation.langchain_project: LangSmith project name for organizing traces
_documentation.langchain_endpoint: Custom LangSmith endpoint URL (optional). Leave empty for default
_documentation.openai_temperature: Temperature for OpenAI API (0.0-2.0). Higher = more creative, Lower = more focused
_documentation.openai_max_tokens: Maximum tokens for OpenAI responses. Set to null for model default
_documentation.openai_base_url: Custom OpenAI API base URL (optional). Leave empty for default OpenAI endpoint
_documentation.use_embeddings: Enable embedding-based search. Set to true or false
_documentation.embedding_top_k: Number of top results to return from embedding search (integer)
_documentation.fetch_url: URL for the search/fetch service endpoint
_documentation.profile_url: Base URL for the profile service
_documentation.server_host: Host address for the agent server. Use '0.0.0.0' to accept connections from any interface
_documentation.server_port: Port number for the agent server (integer)
_documentation.cors_origins: Array of allowed CORS origins. Add frontend URLs that should be allowed to access the API
